data.message: I'm fkn mthrfkn pissed all the time on a gladiator level quite frankly cause there is a million things I'd rather do than talk shit to a government employee cause they ain't doing their goddamn job right but I have no choice... then it becomes a cat and mouse game to them.. someone doesn't understand fkn with peoples livelihood and resources might get them fkd up tho  that ain't a game.
